mapper.insert: insert into account(id, pass, email, name) values(#{id }, #{pass }, #{email }, #{name })
mapper.select: select * from account where id = #{id } and pass = #{pass }
select * from account inner join follow on account.id = follow.user2 where (follow.user1 = #{user1 } and follow.following1 = 1)
select * from account inner join follow on account.id = follow.user1 where (follow.user1 = #{user2 } and follow.following2 = 1)
select * from account inner join follow on account.id = follow.user2 where follow.user1 = #{user1 }
select * from account inner join follow on account.id = follow.user1 where follow.user1 = #{user2 }
mapper.update: update * set phone= #{phone }, profile= #{profile }, nick= #{nick }, gender= #{gender }, birth= #{birth }, intro= #{intro }, scope= #{scope } where id= #{id }
